The devil! One more house has fired in the center of Paris now. And again people have suffered. There were 13 immigrants from Chechnya. At this moment it became clear for our police that it had been purposive arson of the house. And according to some information it was organized by protofascists. They try to manipulate those people who frown on present-day policy of our authorities. The matter is that many European governments connive at activity of Islam extremists of all stripes even after recent terrorist acts in London. So-called French Committee on Support of Chechnya poured oil on flames when it officially announced public fund raising for "jihad against unbelievers in Iraq, Afghanistan and other hot spots of the planet". I hear the same committees actively act in the USA, namely in Boston. And Americans also endure the presence of such organizations on their territory, forgetting the horror of 9/11 tragedy! It is simply rubbish!

post_info.post_title: One more house has fired in the center of Paris now.
